description:
• 13,000+ Students have enrolled in my 13 Courses!
  • The 4.8 Rating from student reviews shows the value packed in this course!
  • Practicality: Over 20 strategies that you can use to become an authority figure in your industry straight away!

Personal Branding is a buzzword, but what does it mean exactly? What have the so-called "Experts" & "Specialists" achieve to merit that status? How can anybody hack their way through branding in order to be perceived as an authority figure in their field?

I created this course to answer all those questions and to provide you with an elaborate & step-by-step blueprint of how to achieve Personal Branding greatness.

My course topics are varied: LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Excel & PowerPoint, Employability & Productivity…

…by now you're probably thinking that I'm a Social Media, Udemy & Microsoft Office expert but it wasn't always this way. Over the past 8 months I was able to engineer my authority by

A) rapidly accumulating critical specialized knowledge in these fields and

B) hacking the system to be perceived by outsiders as a greater knowledge expert than industry veterans with 10 to 20 years of experience.

That in two words is Personal Branding.

Can anybody establish him/herself as an authority in their respective domain? Yes. And the blueprint for that is in this course.

The Content

Anyone can hack what's normally at least a 5 to 10 year process by implementing my step-by-step Personal Branding System via:

#1) The Top 24 Knowledge & Authority Hacks to acquire specialized knowledge and position yourself as a guru in your domain within the next 30 days

#2) The 7-Piece Online & Offline Personal Brand Portfolio: Further expand your visibility through Social Media, Video Creation and special QR Code Business Cards

#3) The Daily Success Formula to establish routines that over 12 to 24 months will accumulate leading you to become a renowned pundit in your niche.

I'll also including bonuses such as

  • 2 case studies of success stories
  • 3 PDF templates ...
  • a networking script for high-value positioning with CEOs & entrepreneurs even if you're just starting out in your field

The Guarantee

There is a 30 day money-back guarantee that comes with this course, therefore you have nothing to lose by enroling. I'm confident that you won't even consider the guarantee given the immense value that is packed within this course.
title: Personal Branding Blueprint
